name: Real Mess
description:
Jump through the messy rooms and find glitchy objects that can change their shape. Be careful, each pick up can cost you sanity, and each wrong choice - 1/3 of your life.

In every room there is a group of objects, one of them is glitchy. Normal objects change their place after each blink, but glitched object also change its form. 

This game was made for Warsaw Pro Jam 2022
